Typealiases.html#/s:7CouchDB15SessionCal.name: SessionCallback
Typealiases.html#/s:7CouchDB15SessionCal.abstract: Callback for _session requests, containing the session cookie, the JSON response,

Structs/ConnectionProperties.html#/s:7Co.name: host
Structs/ConnectionProperties.html#/s:7Co.abstract: Hostname or IP address to the CouchDB server

Structs/ConnectionProperties.html#/s:7Co.name: port
Structs/ConnectionProperties.html#/s:7Co.abstract: Port number where CouchDB server is listening for incoming connections

Structs/ConnectionProperties.html#/s:7Co.name: secured
Structs/ConnectionProperties.html#/s:7Co.abstract: Whether or not to use a secured connection

Classes/UsersDatabase.html#/s:7CouchDB13.name: createUser(document:callback:)
Classes/UsersDatabase.html#/s:7CouchDB13.abstract: Create new user by name and password.

Classes/Database/QueryParameters.html#/s.name: conflicts
Classes/Database/QueryParameters.html#/s.abstract: Includes conflicts information in response. Ignored if include_docs isn’t true. Default is false.

Classes/Database/QueryParameters.html#/s.name: descending
Classes/Database/QueryParameters.html#/s.abstract: Return the documents in descending by key order. Default is false.

Classes/Database/QueryParameters.html#/s.name: endKey
Classes/Database/QueryParameters.html#/s.abstract: Stop returning records when the specified key is reached.

Classes/Database/QueryParameters.html#/s.name: endKeyDocID
Classes/Database/QueryParameters.html#/s.abstract: Stop returning records when the specified document ID is reached. Requires endkey to be specified for this to have any effect.

Classes/Database/QueryParameters.html#/s.name: group
Classes/Database/QueryParameters.html#/s.abstract: Group the results using the reduce function to a group or single row. Default is false

Classes/Database/QueryParameters.html#/s.name: groupLevel
Classes/Database/QueryParameters.html#/s.abstract: Specify the group level to be used.

Classes/Database/QueryParameters.html#/s.name: includeDocs
Classes/Database/QueryParameters.html#/s.abstract: Include the associated document with each row. Default is false.

Classes/Database/QueryParameters.html#/s.name: attachments
Classes/Database/QueryParameters.html#/s.abstract: Include the Base64-encoded content of attachments in the documents that are included if include_docs is true. Ignored if include_docs isn’t true. Default is false.

Classes/Database/QueryParameters.html#/s.name: attachmentEncodingInfo
Classes/Database/QueryParameters.html#/s.abstract: Include encoding information in attachment stubs if include_docs is true and the particular attachment is compressed. Ignored if include_docs isn’t true. Default is false.

Classes/Database/QueryParameters.html#/s.name: inclusiveEnd
Classes/Database/QueryParameters.html#/s.abstract: Specifies whether the specified end key should be included in the result. Default is true.

Classes/Database/QueryParameters.html#/s.name: limit
Classes/Database/QueryParameters.html#/s.abstract: Limit the number of the returned documents to the specified number.

Classes/Database/QueryParameters.html#/s.name: reduce
Classes/Database/QueryParameters.html#/s.abstract: Use the reduction function. Default is true.

Classes/Database/QueryParameters.html#/s.name: skip
Classes/Database/QueryParameters.html#/s.abstract: Skip this number of records before starting to return the results. Default is 0.

Classes/Database/QueryParameters.html#/s.name: stale
Classes/Database/QueryParameters.html#/s.abstract: Allow the results from a stale view to be used.

Classes/Database/QueryParameters.html#/s.name: startKey
Classes/Database/QueryParameters.html#/s.abstract: Return records starting with the specified key.

Classes/Database/QueryParameters.html#/s.name: startKeyDocID
Classes/Database/QueryParameters.html#/s.abstract: Return records starting with the specified document ID. Requires startkey to be specified for this to have any effect.

Classes/Database/QueryParameters.html#/s.name: updateSequence
Classes/Database/QueryParameters.html#/s.abstract: Response includes an update_seq value indicating which sequence id of the database the view reflects. Default is false.

Classes/Database/QueryParameters.html#/s.name: keys
Classes/Database/QueryParameters.html#/s.abstract: Return only documents where the key matches one of the keys specified in the array.

Classes/Database/StaleOptions.html#/s:7C.name: OK
Classes/Database/StaleOptions.html#/s:7C.abstract: CouchDB will not refresh the view even if it is stale.

Classes/Database/StaleOptions.html#/s:7C.name: updateAfter
Classes/Database/StaleOptions.html#/s:7C.abstract: CouchDB will update the view after the stale result is returned.

Classes/Database.html#/s:7CouchDB8Databa.name: KeyType
Classes/Database.html#/s:7CouchDB8Databa.abstract: Typealias used for building query parameters in view functions.

Classes/Database/QueryParameters.html.name: QueryParameters
Classes/Database/QueryParameters.html.abstract: Query parameters for view functions from design documents.

Classes/Database.html#/s:7CouchDB8Databa.name: connProperties
Classes/Database.html#/s:7CouchDB8Databa.abstract: ConnectionProperties the Database will use for its actions.

Classes/Database.html#/s:7CouchDB8Databa.name: retrieve(_:callback:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:7CouchDB8Databa.abstract: Retrieve a document from the database by ID.

Classes/Database.html#/s:7CouchDB8Databa.name: queryByView(_:ofDesign:usingParameters:callback:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:7CouchDB8Databa.abstract: Executes the specified view function from the specified design document.

Classes/Database.html#/s:7CouchDB8Databa.name: retrieveAttachment(_:attachmentName:callback:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:7CouchDB8Databa.abstract: Get an attachment associated with a specified document.

Classes/Database.html#/s:7CouchDB8Databa.name: deleteAttachment(_:docRevison:attachmentName:failOnNotFound:callback:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:7CouchDB8Databa.abstract: Delete an attachment associated with a specified document.

Classes/CouchDBClient.html#/s:7CouchDB0A.name: dbExists(_:callback:)
Classes/CouchDBClient.html#/s:7CouchDB0A.abstract: Returns a Bool indicating whether a Database with the given name exists.

Classes/CouchDBClient.html#/s:7CouchDB0A.name: deleteDB(_:callback:)
Classes/CouchDBClient.html#/s:7CouchDB0A.abstract: Delete a Database given a local instance of it.

Classes/CouchDBClient.html#/s:7CouchDB0A.name: setConfig(keyPath:value:callback:)
Classes/CouchDBClient.html#/s:7CouchDB0A.abstract: Set a CouchDB configuration parameter to a new value.

Classes/CouchDBClient.html#/s:7CouchDB0A.name: getConfig(keyPath:callback:)
Classes/CouchDBClient.html#/s:7CouchDB0A.abstract: Get the value for a CouchDB configuration parameter.

Classes/CouchDBClient.html#/s:7CouchDB0A.name: createSession(name:password:callback:)
Classes/CouchDBClient.html#/s:7CouchDB0A.abstract: Create a new session for the given user credentials.
